summary: Utility module for the Moto Managed Blockchain mock. It offers generic helpers for parsing Managed Blockchain URLs, extracting resource identifiers (network, member, node, proposal, invitation), validating admin passwords, and performing simple collection queries such as counting members or nodes and checking name existence within a network.
business_intent: Enable the mock AWS Managed Blockchain service to correctly interpret request URLs, manage resource identifiers, and provide lightweight validation and lookup functions needed by the serviceâ€™s simulated endpoints.
